name: Alive: the game
description:
Alive: the game Ludum Dare 46 game jam submission.

Top-down survival shooter: survive as long as you can!

https://lchsk.com

Alternative game link: https://lchsk.com/alive_game/

Ludum Dare 46 link: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/46/$200519

Game play video:


Controls

WASD - movement

Mouse - change direction, Mouse left button - shoot 1, 2, 3 - select weapons

ESC to quit
